code: public String getTempFilePath(String fileName) throws IOException {     File f = createAndRegisterTempFile(fileName).     return f.toURI().toString(). }

public String createTempFile(String fileName, String contents) throws IOException {     File f = createAndRegisterTempFile(fileName).     if (!f.getParentFile().exists()) {         f.getParentFile().mkdirs().     }     f.createNewFile().     FileUtils.writeFileUtf8(f, contents).     return f.toURI().toString(). }
public File createAndRegisterTempFile(String fileName) throws IOException {     return new File(TEMPORARY_FOLDER.newFolder(), fileName). }
